titles.title: Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.
Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 231 - 191 (Roll no. 676).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
Declares that when the House adjourns on any legislative day from Friday, July 31, 2009, Saturday, August 1, 2009, or Sunday, August 2, 2009, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Tuesday, September 8, 2009.
Declares that when the Senate recesses or adjourns on any day from Thursday, August 6, 2009, through Tuesday, August 11, 2009, it stand recessed or adjourned until noon on Tuesday, September 8, 2009.
